This game is hard to recommend, but I think it's definitely worth a buy if you have the money. About 75% of time spent playing will be fun, but the other 25% will be frustrating, unbalanced garbage. Despite how rage-inducing the game can be, it's got very addictive gameplay and a lot of the killer designs are great. Like I said before though, there are many problems. However, I still think the fun you'll have is worth the BS you'll face

There is no other game like this. If you buy it, you will likely invest a large amount of hours into being good, and you'll never fully know if you actually enjoy the game or not... but this is the way. A great way to fill time and create a new addiction for yourself. If you are worried about the community, just turn off the chat at the end of the match; that eliminates most of the toxicity people complain about. Most fun with friends in a 4-man team of survivors, but can be fun alone as well.

I used to like this game, the update made it impossible to have fun as a survivor though. The killer range is unbelievably biased and the mechanics have made dodging and escaping the killer almost impossible.
Would not recommend anymore unless you just wanna play almost boring killer games.

Fun game for competitively minded players, looking to challenge themselves against other players in a unique way. After so many years on the market it isn't the most beginner friendly game out there, but if you get into it then it truly provides a unique gaming experience that no other title can really replicate. I would recommend that most gamers (who enjoy a competitive atmosphere, and can handle a format that isn't perfectly balanced) at least give this game a try, because many of you might get far more than your money's worth of enjoyment out of the game.

...... Disclaimer: DO NOT spend an absurd amount of money on the DLC packs. Play the base game first, then buy new killers and survivors only if and when you want to experience them. Having none of the DLC packs will not hurt your gaming experience at all, and will not exclude you from any matchmaking or content beyond playing as the specific characters contained in the DLC.

Pretty solid game with a low to very low bugs rating

The game has gotten so much better over the past couple updates, and the fixes on the PTB are looking very promising. While I still have issues with the new killer, The Trickster, it's still in beta and we'll have to see where this knife-obsessed kpop star goes.

Septiembre de 2021, se han corregido algunos errores, aunque suelen ser recurrentes con cada parche. El problema ahora es la abundancia de cheaters, lo cual, junto con la toxicidad habitual hace muy dificil pasarlo bien jugando.

It could use more add ons. The prestige system needs a major overhaul. More maps, more villains. I would also be so bold as to say it needs a 6th generator to open gates. 5 seems too little. Overall, still a fun game and worth playing.

This game is a must for any horror film/game genre followers! It's developed into an incredible experience...especially for those of us who have been playing since beta.  Very unique game that was once a "only for some people" to everyone that likes the genre.  I have been an on and off player, but keep coming back.  The game is a lot of fun!
